text:
On a hot July evening, a young man stepped out of his garret. He hesitated, glancing back at the staircase. 

He avoided his landlady, who lived below. 

His room felt like a cupboard, cramped and stifling. 

He walked slowly toward K. bridge, lost in thought.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** A young man hesitates as he leaves his cramped garret on a hot July evening.
